about_the_game:
Just as Alcy's about to graduate, she's attacked by an unknown assailant! Knocked unconscious, she wakes up to find that she's somehow ended up on the island of Anatol. There, Alcy learns that there's something a bit unusual about her Cell, a magical device tied to its user's life... And anyone trying to leave Anatol must undergo a thorough Cell examination!

If Alcy wants to get off the island, she must find a way around the Cell inspectors, but this island is full of strange and dangerous monsters. She'll have to get help from the locals, gather materials, and gain the strength she needs... And discover just who her attacker was and why she's so unique

This is a turn-based RPG with a time limit... Don't take too long to escape the island, or you might not make it. Make friends with the locals of Anatol to learn more about them and borrow their powers! Head out into the untamed areas of the island to battle enemies and gather materials. Find a job and earn the money to pay for your room and board.

Saving the world through kindness
Everyone on Anatol has their own struggle, and Alcy has boundless compassion. By befriending them and solving their problems, she can gain their strength and overcome any foe.

A story of trust and betrayal

Only some people on Anatol are virtuous, and some may exploit Alcy's generosity. At the story's center lies the question: Is it better to have faith in others knowing it could be betrayed, or to withhold your trust and prioritize yourself?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
